summary: A college stands in the middle of verdant grounds. One day, Édouard, a student, suddenly falls sick. The college doctor is unable to diagnose the young man's illness.
cast: Laurent Lacotte|Guillaume Verdier|Serge Bozon|Axelle Ropert|Vladimir Léon|Patricia Barzyk|Laurent Talon|Chloé Esdraffo|Benjamin Esdraffo|Raphaële Godin|Hacen Sahraoui
title: Mods
